rules_text:
Draw two cards.
Suspend 2–{1}{B}, Pay 2 life. [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{B} and pay 2 life and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
